开始学习
algorithm-demo.js 
function quickSort(array) {
  if (array.length <= 1) {
    return array;
  }
  
  const pivot = array[0];
  const left = [];
  const right = [];
  
  for (let i = 1; i < array.length; i++) {
    if (array[i] < pivot) {
      left.push(array[i]);
    } else {
      right.push(array[i]);
    }
  }
  
  return [...quickSort(left), pivot, ...quickSort(right)];
}
